column5: Hey guys,  any tips on places to go around burlington tonight to wet a line? any help is appreciated.  Thanks!  Yv
maybe under the skyway bridge? Beach blvd?  thx.
That is indeed a good spot fpr carp fishing. All around the Skyway. You may even run into a Salmon if your lucky.
chuck some cleos around the peir in Bronte
Bronte's where I'd be if I lived there!

There's Lasalle Park ( take Waterdown Rd. south off the 403). Good carp, largemouth and panfish. The pier below the Skyway ( take Eastport off the QEW) lakeside for salmon, bayside for sheephead, channels and panfish. Hope this helps.
Going to Bronte tomorrow early. How crowded does the creek get on the weekends?
my vote is for bronte  Cheers!

hit bronte around 2pm, and got nothing....a few guys out and had no luck...  Then hit the skyway bridge waterway this evening (7:30 -> 9:00) and nothin. A few guys out, but nothing really hitting. I did seeone guy bring in a nice Perch....   thanks for the feedback guys.  cheers,  Yv
